variable.name: sex
variable.description: Child's sex, from the Civil Registration System

variable.name: respirator
variable.description: Child admitted to the NICU after birth and placed on a respirator (from the Medical Birth Register)?

variable.name: premie
variable.description: Indicator of case/control status

variable.name: oral_herpes
variable.description: Mother reported suffering from oral herpes in the period between conception and the 2nd interview?

variable.name: genital_herpes
variable.description: Mother reported suffering from genital herpes in the period between conception and the 2nd interview?

variable.name: genital_warts
variable.description: Mother reported suffering from genital warts in the period between conception and the 2nd interview?

variable.name: smoke_0to12w
variable.description: Mother reported any smoking in the period between conception and the 1st interview?

variable.name: smoke_12to30w
variable.description: Mother reported any smoking in the period between the 1st and 2nd interviews?

variable.name: smoke_after30w
variable.description: Mother reported any smoking in the period between the 2nd interview and delivery?

variable.name: alcohol_0to12w
variable.description: Mother reported any alcohol intake in the period between conception and the 1st interview?

variable.name: alcohol_12to30w
variable.description: Mother reported any alcohol intake in the period between the 1st and 2nd interviews?

variable.name: alcohol_after30w
variable.description: Mother reported any alcohol intake in the period between the 2nd interview and birth?

variable.name: vit_0to30w
variable.description: Mother reported taking prenatal vitamins in the period between conception and the 2nd interview?

variable.name: vit_after30w
variable.description: Mother reported taking prenatal vitamins in the period between the 2nd interview and delivery?

variable.name: prom_int
variable.description: Mother reported > 24 h elapsed between her waters breaking and delivery?

variable.name: prepreg_wt
variable.description: Maternal weight before pregnancy, self-reported, 1st interview

variable.name: maternal_height
variable.description: Maternal height, self-reported, 1st interview

variable.name: maternal_age
variable.description: Maternal age at child's birth, from the Medical Birth Register

variable.name: birthweight
variable.description: Child's birthweight, from the Medical Birth Register

variable.name: delivery
variable.description: Mode of delivery, from the National Patient Register

variable.name: retinop_prem
variable.description: Child ever registered in the National Patient Register with retinopathy of prematurity (ICD10 code H35.1 = Retinopathy of prematurity)?

variable.name: intravent_hem
variable.description: Child ever registered in the National Patient Register with intraventricular hemorrhage (ICD10 code P27.1, P52.0-P52.3 = Intraventricular (nontraumatic) haemorrhage, grade 1, of fetus and newborn; Intraventricular (nontraumatic) haemorrhage, grade 2, of fetus and newborn; Intraventricular (nontraumatic) haemorrhage, grade 3, of fetus and newborn; Unspecified intraventricular (nontraumatic) haemorrhage of fetus and newborn, respectively)?

variable.name: bronch_dysp
variable.description: Child ever registered in the National Patient Register with broncho-pulmonary dysplasia (ICD10 code P27.1 = Bronchopulmonary dysplasia originating in the perinatal period)?

variable.name: m_genevaID
variable.description: GENEVA ID, mother

variable.name: c_genevaID
variable.description: GENEVA ID, child

variable.name: cohabiting
variable.description: Mother married or living with partner at time of 1st interview?

variable.name: UTI_0to30w
variable.description: Mother reported >/= 1 urinary tract infections in the period between conception and the 2nd interview?

variable.name: UTI_after30w
variable.description: Mother reported >/= 1 urinary tract infections in the period between the 2nd interview and delivery?

variable.name: vaginf_0to30w
variable.description: Mother reported >/= 1 vaginal fungal infections in the period between conception and the 2nd interview?

variable.name: maternal_bmi
variable.description: Maternal pre-pregnancy BMI

variable.name: c_birthyear
variable.description: Child's year of birth, from the Civil Registration System

variable.name: m_birthyear
variable.description: Mother's year of birth, from the Civil Registration System

variable.name: chorio_reg
variable.description: Mother diagnosed with chorioamnionitis during pregnancy (registered in National Patient Register with ICD10 code O41.1 = Infection of amniotic sac and membranes)?

variable.name: c_birthdec
variable.description: Child's decade of birth, from the Civil Registration System

variable.name: c_birthqtr
variable.description: Child's quarter of birth, from the Civil Registration System

variable.name: c_race_ethn
variable.description: Child's race/ethnicity

variable.name: country
variable.description: Country mother-child pair recruited in

variable.name: m_birthdec
variable.description: Mother's decade of birth, from the Civil Registration System

variable.name: m_birthqtr
variable.description: Mother's quarter of birth, from the Civil Registration System

variable.name: m_race_ethn
variable.description: Mother's race/ethnicity

variable.name: m_sample
variable.description: Mother's DNA submitted for genotyping?

variable.name: c_sample
variable.description: Child's DNA submitted for genotyping?

variable.name: m_genotype
variable.description: Maternal genotype available?

variable.name: c_genotype
variable.description: Child's genotype available?

variable.name: c_comment
variable.description: Reason for lack of child genotype (for children with DNA submitted for genotyping)

variable.name: m_comment
variable.description: Reason for lack of maternal genotype (for mothers with DNA submitted for genotyping)

variable.name: c_flag
variable.description: Child's DNA submitted for genotyping but no genotype in the final dataset?

variable.name: m_flag
variable.description: Maternal DNA submitted for genotyping but no genotype in the final dataset?

variable.name: ga_days
variable.description: Gestational age at birth in days, consensus variable

variable.name: ga_weeks
variable.description: Gestational age at birth in completed weeks, consensus variable
